Hi!
does anyone have a franche subtitle!?

i've only found english, portugues and spanish subtitles!!! this is the site:
http://www.subtitleseeker.com/0792966/Faute+%E0+Fidel%21++La/Subtitles/

These subs sync perfectly, though dunno anything about the "extras" if they are even there. Didn't notice yet.
http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/subtitles/3290142/faute-a-fidel-la-en
PS, I think I had to rename them to match the movie's title here. Just spell it exactly the same plus .srt. Easy peasy. Use vlc player, it always makes subs work great for me.
